comment: "Screwed me on payment for an investigative story that took 7 months to research and write, killing it when I asked for a higher rate due to a new editor demanding I start all over, investigating new areas at the last minute."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "High-level editor asked me to write a piece, went through edits, never published, no kill fee, nothing."

"Editor was fantastic to work with. I had a death in the family the day before deadline and a family emergency day-of. I still filed on time, but she was very generous in offering accommodation. Edits were 100% for a better product, as opposed to editor ego. Would love to work with her and The Verge again."
